frontmatter.title: Review the devices attached to your home network
frontmatter.description: By entering your default gateway IP into your browser, you can view and manage the devices that are attached to your home network. It is a good idea to check that these are only the devices you expect, and that you donâ€™t see anything unfamiliar that may be taking advantage of your network.
